glsa.title: Hashcash: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A format string vulnerability in the Hashcash utility could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Hashcash is a utility for generating Hashcash tokens, a proof-of-work system to reduce the impact of spam.

description.p: Tavis Ormandy of the Gentoo Linux Security Audit Team identified a flaw in the Hashcash utility that an attacker could expose by specifying a malformed reply address.

impact.p: Successful exploitation would permit an attacker to disrupt Hashcash users, and potentially execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
